definition.title: So... what is Aphilia?
paragraphs: Imagine wanting flowers in the yard, a tiny orchard for future pies, and a balcony vegetable patch—all while juggling watering schedules, soil types, and compatibility charts. That's the headache we signed up to solve.

Aphilia is our encyclopedic playground for plant lovers, biodiversity geeks, and anyone flirting with homegrown meals. It's packed with practical knowledge, seasonal surprises, and the friendly tone you'd get from a neighbor who actually reads gardening books.

Beyond the data, we obsess over care methods, let you sketch out gardens, log the plants you already own, schedule watering automatically, and cross-check which species vibe together so you can craft micro-ecosystems that treat the planet kindly.
definition.helper: TL;DR: we translate gardening chaos into approachable, nerd-approved guidance.
